notes: A vocabulary resulting from the cooperation of the groups of REALITER network that collects the basic terminology mostly used in texts about Genomics. It contains equivalents in English, Peninsular and Latinamerican Spanish, French, Italian, Galician, Portuguese and Catalan.
title: Basic vocabulary on the Human Genome
